description.full: This is the template to get started.

supertip.title: Show Taskpane
supertip.description: Opens a pane displaying all available properties.

supertip.title: Perform an action
supertip.description: Perform an action when clicked.

supertip.title: Adobe PDF
supertip.description: Convert document to professional PDF using Adobe.io

supertip.title: Project Charter PDF
supertip.description: Convert to professional Project Charter PDF using PMBOK template

supertip.description: Convert to professional Technical Specification PDF

supertip.title: Business Requirements PDF
supertip.description: Convert to professional Business Requirements PDF using BABOK template

supertip.title: InDesign Layout
supertip.description: Create professional print-ready layout using Adobe InDesign

supertip.title: Generate Diagrams
supertip.description: Create professional diagrams using Adobe Illustrator

supertip.title: Multi-Format Package
supertip.description: Generate PDF, InDesign, and Diagrams in one package

supertip.title: AI Content Analysis
supertip.description: Analyze document with AI for intelligent recommendations

supertip.title: Smart Diagrams
supertip.description: Generate diagrams from natural language using AI

supertip.title: AI Template Builder
supertip.description: Create custom templates using AI analysis

supertip.title: AI Optimization
supertip.description: Optimize document structure and readability with AI

supertip.title: Enable Collaboration
supertip.description: Start real-time collaboration with AI team assistance

supertip.title: Share AI Insights
supertip.description: Share AI analysis and recommendations with team

supertip.title: Sync with Project
supertip.description: Connect document to project management system

supertip.title: Setup Workflow
supertip.description: Create automated document approval workflow

supertip.title: Mobile Collaboration
supertip.description: Enable cross-platform mobile collaboration with offline support

supertip.title: Setup PWA
supertip.description: Enable Progressive Web App with offline capabilities

supertip.description: Enable seamless sync across all devices and platforms

supertip.title: Mobile Optimization
supertip.description: Optimize document and interface for mobile devices

supertip.title: Advanced Analytics
supertip.description: Generate comprehensive analytics with performance monitoring

supertip.title: Performance Monitor
supertip.description: Real-time performance monitoring with optimization recommendations

supertip.title: Predictive Insights
supertip.description: Machine learning-powered predictions and intelligent recommendations

supertip.title: Analytics Dashboard
supertip.description: Create real-time dashboard with comprehensive metrics

supertip.title: Enterprise Intelligence
supertip.description: Deploy advanced AI models with deep learning and autonomous systems

supertip.title: Automation Engine

supertip.title: Business Intelligence

supertip.title: Enterprise Dashboard

supertip.title: Interactive Timeline
supertip.description: Generate clickable, zoomable timeline with drag-and-drop features
